title: SET_PLAYER_MAY_ONLY_ENTER_THIS_VEHICLE
content:
0x8026FF78F208978A0xA454DD29// SetPlayerMayOnlyEnterThisVehicle
void SET_PLAYER_MAY_ONLY_ENTER_THIS_VEHICLE(Player player, Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:player: The player index.vehicle: Vehicle id.Limit the player to only enter this vehicle. Note set vehicle to false if you want them to access any vehicle.
codeBlocks:
local player = source
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_PLAYER_MAY_ONLY_ENTER_THIS_VEHICLE
SetPlayerMayOnlyEnterThisVehicle(player, vehicle)
